page.title: 19Trade in Grundisburgh
page.content: The following Trades function within the area: Shops - Post Office and General Store, General Store, Butcher, Hardware Store with Building Society Agency, Art and Craft Shop. Other Facilities - Public Houses (2), Garage/Motor Repairer (2), Builders' Merchant, Builder, Business Computer Systems Designer/Supplier, Architect, Dentist (In Private Practice), Musical Instrument Maker, Electrical Contractor and Electrician, Joinery, Commercial and Supplying Dairy, Commercial and Graphic Artist, Fine Artist. Home Industry - Exists largely as an extension of Recreation. Economics - It is not possible to deduce economic interdependence because of the influence of the nearby towns of Woodbridge and Ipswich, their provision and employment.
